name: 3dLocalBistat
author: AFNI Developers
description: Compute statistics between 2 datasets at each voxel based on a local neighborhood.

inputs.description: Specifies the neighborhood around each voxel for statistics calculation. Types include: SPHERE(r), RECT(a,b,c), RHDD(r), TOHD(r)
inputs.name: Neighborhood

inputs.description: Statistic to compute in the region around each voxel. Multiple options allowed. Includes: pearson, spearman, quadrant, mutinfo, normuti, jointent, hellinger, crU, crM, crA, L2slope, L1slope, num, ALL.
inputs.name: Statistics

inputs.description: Read in a dataset to use as a mask. Non-zero voxels define the mask region.
inputs.name: Mask

inputs.description: Compute the mask as in program 3dAutomask. Mutually exclusive with -mask.
inputs.name: Automatic mask

inputs.description: Use dataset as a weight (applies to pearson).
inputs.name: Weight

inputs.description: Sets the exponent for the number of bins in the histogram used for Hellinger, Mutual Information, and Correlation Ratio statistics.
inputs.name: Histogram Power

inputs.description: Sets the number of bins directly in the histogram used for Hellinger, Mutual Information, and Correlation Ratio statistics.
inputs.name: Histogram Bins

inputs.description: Clip dataset1 to lie between specified values.
inputs.name: Clip Dataset 1

inputs.description: Clip dataset2 to lie between specified values.
inputs.name: Clip Dataset 2

output-files.description: Output dataset header for AFNI format
output-files.name: Output Header

output-files.description: Output dataset BRIK for AFNI format
output-files.name: Output BRIK
